requirements.title: User Authentication System
requirements.description: Users must be able to create accounts, log in securely, and manage their profiles. The system should support email/password authentication with optional two-factor authentication.
requirements.business_value: Essential for user security and personalization

requirements.title: Task Creation and Management
requirements.description: Users should be able to create, edit, delete, and organize tasks. Tasks must have titles, descriptions, due dates, priority levels, and status tracking.
requirements.business_value: Core functionality for task management application

requirements.title: Project Organization
requirements.description: Users need to organize tasks into projects. Projects should have names, descriptions, and the ability to contain multiple tasks with shared settings.
requirements.business_value: Enables better organization and workflow management

requirements.title: Real-time Collaboration
requirements.description: Multiple users should be able to collaborate on projects in real-time, with live updates when tasks are modified, created, or completed.

requirements.title: Mobile Responsive Design
requirements.description: The application must work seamlessly on mobile devices with touch-friendly interface and responsive layout that adapts to different screen sizes.

requirements.title: Task Notifications and Reminders
requirements.description: Users should receive notifications for approaching due dates, task assignments, and project updates via email and in-app notifications.
requirements.business_value: Improves user engagement and task completion rates

requirements.title: Search and Filtering
requirements.description: Users need to search tasks and projects by keywords, and filter by status, priority, due date, and assigned users.
requirements.business_value: Improves user productivity when managing many tasks

requirements.title: Data Export and Backup
requirements.description: Users should be able to export their data in common formats (JSON, CSV) and the system should automatically backup user data.

requirements.title: Performance and Scalability
requirements.description: The system must handle 1000+ concurrent users with response times under 200ms for common operations and support horizontal scaling.
requirements.business_value: Ensures good user experience as the platform grows

requirements.title: API for Third-party Integrations
requirements.description: Provide RESTful API endpoints to allow integration with external tools like calendars, email clients, and project management software.
requirements.business_value: Enables ecosystem growth and user workflow integration

criteria.description: User can register with email and password
User can log in with valid credentials
User cannot log in with invalid credentials
User can create a new task with title and description
User can edit existing task details
User can delete tasks they own
Task status updates are reflected immediately in UI
Changes made by one user appear in real-time for other users

technical: Must use modern web technologies (React/Vue.js frontend)
Must be deployable on cloud platforms
regulatory: Must comply with GDPR for EU users
Must implement proper data retention policies
User data must be encrypted at rest and in transit
